STATISTICS_NAME: SDDSプラス 金融健全性指標（FSIｓ）
TITLE: 金融健全性指標（FSIs）
STAT_NAME.$: 特別データ公表基準（SDDS）プラス
TITLE_SPEC.TABLE_EXPLANATION:
(*)Tier 1 (and Tier 2) will not be used for domestic banks, with only "core capital(**)" being captured as regulatory capital for them. Along with that change, Tier 1 ratio no longer exists for domestic banks, and the definitions of regulatory capital will be largely different between internationally active banks and domestic ones.

(**)e.g., common stock, mandatory convertible preferred stock

(***)The responsible authorities are as follows:
1): Financial Services Agency
2): Financial Services Agency
3): Financial Services Agency
4): Financial Services Agency
5): Bank of Japan
6): Bank of Japan
7): Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism

(****)Regarding the data for "Residential real estate prices", preliminary figures are shown in italics on MLIT website.
